players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Diana is mafia because she discovered me. I have no evidence, but she seems suspicious."
Charlie: "Bob, if Diana discovered you, she'd know your role. Why would she accuse you? That seems odd."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Bob knows I'm detective. He's lying."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he has motive to lie. Alice was innocent. Only Bob can be mafia."
Charlie: "Bob, if you were mafia you would have killed Alice. Diana’s claim that she found you is suspicious, especially since she didn’t mention Alice. I think Bob is mafia."
You: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe someone else. Diana’s claim that she found me is suspicious, but I’m not the only suspect."
